snippet: Lawyers hired by 21st Century Fox took statements from at least six other women who described inappropriate behavior by Roger Ailes, two people briefed on the inquiry said....
abstract: People familiar with inquiry into sexual harassment allegations against Fox News head Roger Ailes by former host Gretchen Carlson say 21st Century Fox executives decided to end his tenure after collecting statements from at least six other women detailing inappropriate behavior; both 21st Century Fox and Ailes's representatives are looking for compromise that will allow Ailes to exist even as company recognizes his contributions.

byline.original: By JIM RUTENBERG, BEN PROTESS and EMILY STEEL

lead_paragraph: Lawyers hired by 21st Century Fox took statements from at least six other women who described inappropriate behavior by Roger Ailes, two people briefed on the inquiry said.

headline.main: Internal Inquiry Sealed the Fate of Roger Ailes at Fox
headline.print_headline: Internal Inquiry  Sealed the Fate  of Ailes at Fox
